turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I'd like to place a coffee order from Starbucks that I can pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing—which location would you like to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the corner of Spring Street and Varick Street in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem at all. What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd love a Caramel Brulee Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great—what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what kind of milk would you like used in the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd love to use oat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know some locations don't have oat milk, so if that's the case here, is there a backup you'd like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, if no oat milk, please ask for almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! And would you like whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does it normally come with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, the default drink includes whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then I'll take that along with it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. And are there are any other flavors or extras you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of options are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can ask them for extra sugar, extra whipped cream, or an extra syrup flavor.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'm good as-is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Your drink will be ready for pickup shortly at the chosen Starbucks location, and your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you! Goodbye.
